content: The European Union is set up with the aim of ending the frequent and bloody wars between neighbours, which culminated in the Second World War.
translations: ita:Lâ€™Unione europea viene posta in essere allo scopo di mettere fine alle guerre frequenti e sanguinose tra paesi vicini, c
